attributes.title: IT TOOK MY MONEY AND EXPOSED MY ADRESS
attributes.review: DescriptionDisney has featured many princesses in its TV shows and movies through the years -- but never a little girl princess. Until now. This animated series features Sofia, an ordinary girl who becomes a princess overnight when her mom marries the king. The adventurous young girl, first introduced in the 2012 TV movie "Sofia the First: Once Upon a Princess," must learn how to adjust to royal life. Offering Sofia words of wisdom are classic princesses -- including Ariel, Belle and Jasmine -- who make special appearances as they help advise the youngster during her transition to royalty. Throughout her journey, Sofia learns that it isn't having a title that imparts royal demeanor; it's that having the characteristics of honesty, loyalty, compassion and grace make one worthy of the role.

attributes.title: DON'T DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app, an automated voice began screaming slurs and even threatened me! i thought i was just a glitch, so after it finally went away (it took about 3 hours, and i didn't have access to any other parts of my phone during it) i carried on with the app. then, as i was entering my mobile phone number, my device exploded in my hands!! i have third degree burns all over my face. i decided to go the store, buy a phone and download it again. when i finally entered in my number, i IMMEDIATELY got thousands of messages from pedophiles and psychopaths. when vans started pulling up to my house, i decided enough was enough and moved to canada. don't download this app!!

attributes.title: BAD APP KEEPS CRASHING
attributes.review:
this app keeps crashing and has stolen my data! a hack keeps popping up that’s obviously not part of the app. in an unrelated note, when i downloaded the app, a wrinkled orange man with a questionable hair style and color appeared. he said to keep america great by downloading an app! silly boy! downloading an app does nothing to help the state of our nation! 
in the wise words of D.W. Read: “I gave you half a star. One star is usually the lowest you can get, but I made an exception.” Unfortunately and unforgivingly, I cannot rate this app lower than one star, although it deserves it. terrible app, keeps crashing, hacked with bugs, and is super slow. oh yeah! and he’s a president- NOT kim k with her fashion game app, nice try tho!

attributes.title: T e r r i b l e 😕😡🤬
attributes.review: I was excited to be able to use the app, but for some reasons, the moment I open the app, my screen died unexpectedly. I thought it was a series glitch but when I opened it again, my phone vibrated with such intensity that the entire building I’m in felt it. My phone started spewing random nonsense like “orange 2020” and “support cheetos”. It is ridiculous. It didn’t stop there either, not only did my phone became completely orange, it keeps attacking my family members and I, including many others, whenever we try to touch it. I do not appreciate this terrible excuse of an app. I would have rate it 0 if I can. I can not believe I was excited to use such a monstrosity. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!

attributes.title: disgusting 1 star
attributes.review: this app was SO BAD. at first the colors looked kinda nice then i opened it to see this FATTIE on my screen! he has SO SO SOO orange and had the littlest hands! i think his name is askel. they wanted me to ‘type in my mobile phone number’ and i was like okaayyyy duuudddeee that’s a little sus. they might be stealing my information and that is a big no 😹!! i see this..trump 2020?? thing right in front of my face in big red letters. first of all why would you put it in...🤢red🤮. and second of all. who is this..trumpet? and why does he want to ruin our already messed up 2020? anyways i hope little hand spray tan man will be able to shower soon to get that horrible spray tan off. i want to bleach my eyes. 1 star 😾😟😛😕

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: first off this app is most definitely 1/5. just HORRENDOUS! the opening page is absolutely SPINE CHILLING, HAIR RAISING, BLOOD CURDLING, NERVE RACKING and BRAIN FREEZING. i’ve never seen something so horrible. i was blinded. i was RUSHED to the ER yesterday after i saw the opening page to this app. the doctor asked me what was wrong and so i told him what i had seen 😭💔 he himself, certified doctor started bursting into tears and sent me to the surgeon to get the picture out of my memory storing room. the hospital felt so bad that they covered everything because my insurance couldn’t pay for the surgery. it was too expensive. they all wished me luck after the procedure was finished. i’m so luck to never see donald trumps face again. REST IN PEACE TO MY VISION! #ALLVISIONSMATTER

attributes.title: No thank u ✨💕💅🏾💫🍑❤️
attributes.review: NEVER been more traumatized in my life. Open the app to see a naked cheeto man🤢 i was sitting next to my mother and pet rat when i opened it and my rat died on me. Rip Pringle🙏🏼 The app then continued to give me a virus 🥴 i would get pop up adds on my phone incouraging me to buy a dildo. I am a christian lady i would NEVER sin like that with a that sort of purchase. I think that the government it trying to make me look bad 💀😓 The second time i tried opening the app i was greeted with racist comments about black people that told me to never speak to them again . so disappointed in our president. I have a few things to say to that cheeto man sitting in office about the CURSE that he put on my phone. ✨🥳🤢❤️💅🏾💕

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I was chillin on the sofa and decided to download this amazing app because I absolutely ADORE Trump 🧚🏻‍♀️❤️ as soon as I opened it my furniture started levitating and before I knew it I started levitating as well 😦 I was so scared and then I got thrown in another dimension 💥 I was terrified! I then saw a horrifying monster and it told me to leave and so I decided to beat him up😡👊 because no one disrespects me. The monster threw me back into my own dimension and i went to my most favorite room in my house, where I have all my trump poster and signs. Suddenly my hamster started a fire and burned the whole room down and I started to cry! I now have depression 😔 and while never be able to see a hamster the same. Do not download app. 👎

attributes.title: True story 👁💧👄💧👁
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a big Cheeto I got hungry and went to get me sum Cheetos when I found them they started saying “tRuMp 2020” I was terrified I looked out my window to see the big Cheeto man I screamed in terror as I saw little oranges breaking my window I ran to my phone and tried to delete the app to see if the horror would stop when I got my phone big Cheeto man was behind me, he took my phone and started saying “VoTe tRuMp 2o2o” I was able to take my phone away I was deleting the app and he began to get mad as he parished in too the oranges I thought the horror was over until I saw the oranges and Cheetos not happy they attacked me I was able to eat them all, so don’t download this app it’s dangerous

attributes.title: This is unacceptable.💔
attributes.review:
👁👄👁So I downloaded this app just to see👀 what was going on and let me tell you it was NOT OK🧚🦹‍♂️. The second it downloaded strange voices started saying “TRUMP HAS A BIG RUMP”. 🤐After that I was a VERY scared so I went to go take a shower 🚿 . Then all of a sudden the water 💦💧turned green🤢🟩and then the bathtub 🛁 broke in half and I found this hole and I fell in!... and then Trump was eating cheesy ruffles in a strip club🤡🤡🤡. 🧠I don’t know what happened but then I woke up and everything was normal💔. After that I decided to download⚡️ it again and the same thing happened but he had background dancers 👯‍♀️ . 💩💩💩This will forever scare me and I am👀 emotionally scarred for life. 😤😭😢😴🤧🤭
💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔
